title: Window Shade, 2009-17-4, 1938–1939
provenance: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation; window shade was one of six commissioned by Doris Duke for theatre in Hollywood Wing at Duke Farms.
creditline: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
description: Large central figure of a man dressed in trousers and jacket of the Republican era. Figure is surrounded by imagery including pagoda-style architecture, rice bowl with chop sticks, a crown, and Muji or wooden sandals.
